May contain spoilers from Blood Lords **Source** [Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage](/Sources.aspx?ID=189) pg. 75 **Traditions** [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Area** 30-foot cone **Saving Throw** Will **Duration** sustained up to 1 minute --- You sing a funereal dirge to force restless spirits to fully manifest in the [Material Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1). Each [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creature in the area takes 4d10 sonic damage (this damage bypasses its resistances) depending on the result of its Will save. **Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature takes half damage.
**Failure** The creature takes full damage and becomes semi-corporeal until the spell ends. All attacks against it get the benefit of a [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) rune.
**Critical Failure** As failure, but double damage. --- **Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d10.
